get.summary: Get list of Numbers on an Account.
get.description: Get a list of Numbers on the specified Account. The returned list is paginated.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

get.description: Get details of a specific Number associated with an Account.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: The phone numberto get configuration for.

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

put.description: Create or update a Number on the specified Account. The Number must have a UC service enabled and other configuration.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: The phone number to request details of.

parameters.name: if-match
parameters.description: Makes a request conditional on a matching etag.

parameters.name: if-none-match
parameters.description: Makes a request conditional on a non-matching etag.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The number details for the phone numbers to upload.

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

409.description: The request conflicts with the current state of the server.

delete.description: Delete a Number on the specified Account.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: The phone number of the number to delete.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

patch.description: Create or update up to 100 Numbers on the specified account. Each Number must have a UC service enabled and other configuration.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The numbers to upload in a batch.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

delete.description: Delete up to 100 numbers on the specified account.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The phone numbers to delete.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

get.summary: Get the list of usages available
get.description: Get a list of usages that can be used by a partner for teams enabled number. Returned as JSON mapping use case to capabilities

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The account name to query.

parameters.name: phoneNumbers
parameters.description: The phone numbers to query capabilities for.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

get.description: Get a specific Civic Address and its associated locations.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: civicAddressId
parameters.description: The ID of the civic address to retrieve.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

get.summary: Get a list of Civic Addresses.
get.description: Get a list of Civic Addresses and its associated locations for a specific Account. The returned list is paginated.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

post.summary: Enable or disable syncing of provisioned data to Teams
post.description: Enable or disable syncing of provisioned data to Teams

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON to indicate if data should by synced to Teams.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

get.description: Get list of Accounts with details. An Account represents an Enterprise or collection of users.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: if-match
parameters.description: Makes a request conditional on a matching etag.

parameters.name: if-none-match
parameters.description: Makes a request conditional on a non-matching etag.

parameters.description: The details of the account to create

delete.description: Delete a specific Account using its Name. This will fail if any Numbers are provisioned on the Account.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: deleteAllSubs
parameters.description: Indicates if all subscribers under the account should also be deleted.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

get.description: Get details of a specific Account using its Name. An Account represents an Enterprise or collection of users.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Additionally return the provisioning state of the backends configured for this account (e.g. DNS subdomain provisioning for Microsoft Teams Direct Routing).

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

get.summary: Get list of Requests for Information (Consents).
get.description: Get the list of Accounts that have submitted a Request for Information (i.e. have consented to being contacted).

parameters.name: productContext
parameters.description: The Teams product context for the RFIs.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

accountNameString.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

correlatorId.description: The opaque correlator id for this account.

teamsCommonConfig.description: Teams Common Account Configuration required for OC and TPM

teamsOcEnabled.description: Indicates that Teams Operator Connect (OC) is enabled for this account.

directRoutingEnabled.description: Indicates that Teams Direct Routing (DR) enabled for this account.

directRouting.description: Teams Direct Routing (DR) Account Configuration. Only accepted if DR is enabled.

teamsTpmEnabled.description: Indicates that Teams Phone Mobile (TPM) is enabled for this account.

teamsTpmConfig.description: Teams Phone Mobile (TPM) Account Configuration. Only accepted if TPM is enabled.

zoomEnabled.description: Indicates that Zoom is enabled for this account.

zoomConfig.description: Zoom Account Configuration. Only accepted if Zoom is enabled.

AssignmentStatus.description: Indicates whether a number is assigned to a user. This is only relevant for some UC providers.

values.name: TpmAssigned
values.description: The phone number a TPM number and is assigned to a user.

values.name: TpmUnassigned
values.description: The phone number a TPM number and is not assigned to a user.

values.name: OcAssigned
values.description: The phone number is a Teams Operator Connect number and is assigned to a user.

values.name: OcUnassigned
values.description: The phone number is a Teams Operator Connect number and is not assigned to a user.

values.name: NA
values.description: The phone number is not configured for use with any services that require the number to be assigned to a user.

numbers.description: The list of number to delete. At most 100 can be deleted in one request.

BatchNumbersPut.description: List of phone numbers to be uploaded to an account via a PUT request.

details.description: The configuration for the number uploaded.

numbers.description: A list of configurations for a set of phone numbers provisioned in ACG.

email.description: The email of the contact detail.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the contact detail.

companyName.description: The company name of the contact detail.

companySize.description: The company size of the contact detail.

customSipHeaderString.description: Contents of the custom SIP header to use with this number. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes. Can be up to 100 characters in length. The name of the custom header is set as part of deploying Azure Communications Gateway.

status.description: The status of the customer relationship.

lastModifiedOn.description: The time (ISO8601 format) when the customer relationship is last modified.
